name: Cedar View: Contemporary A-Frame Cabin House Plan (928 SF) – 2 Bed 2 Bath
open_features: Full drawing set: A.0–S.1 including floor, elevations, MEP, and section:contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}
Floor: 11-7/8 in engineered I-joists @ 16 in O.C. with 3/4 in T&G subfloor:contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}
Roof: 11-7/8 in I-joist rafters @ 16 in O.C., asphalt shingles, felt, R-49 insulation:contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}
Walls: 2x6 studs @16 in O.C., OSB sheathing, housewrap, vinyl siding, BIBS insulation:contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}
Electrical: 200A service, device and lighting layouts, smoke/CO detectors:contentReference[oaicite:11]{index=11}
Mechanical: duct runs with 150 CFM outlets, AC unit, exhaust fans:contentReference[oaicite:12]{index=12}
Plumbing: PEX CW/HW supply, PVC sanitary, tankless water heater:contentReference[oaicite:13]{index=13}
Foundation: 4000psi concrete, 2x6 PT sill, anchors @6 ft O.C., drain tile system:contentReference[oaicite:14]{index=14}
safety_note: Plans are for planning/preliminary use only; final engineering, permitting, and site verification required.
